Text: PNW Gas Electric Integration Group Meeting November The Pacific Northwest Gas Electric Integration Group meeting originally sch eduled for September th has been rescheduled for Friday November The meeting location remains the same The Paramount Hotel in downtown P ortland The address and phone number are listed below My thanks again go to Calpine Corporation who will continue to serve as the host for the Nove mber meeting Please ask for their corporate rate of when making room reservations The meeting remains focused on new generation with almost all the speakers still available and willing to participate The agenda now includes an updated SupplyDemand Outlook for the WCSB a timely topic as we move into the winter heating season The revised agenda is attached You will be advised of any further changes in the agenda Please let me know by November st if you plan on attending the meeting so that Calpine will have an accurate count for lunch I look forward to seeing everyone on the th If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call at Thank you for your patience in getting this meeting rescheduled P at The Paramount Hotel SW Taylor Street Portland OR FAX Email wwwportlan dparamountcom Visit to get a Web site with a personaliz ed domain and Webbased email Agenda doc

A Special Invitation for PNWGE Meeting AttendeesIm sorry you wont be able to make it to the meeting on the th however I wanted to pass on the attached invitation in the event that your travel plans do change In conjunction with the PNW Gas Electric Integration Group meeting on November Calpine would like to invite each of you to the open house of their new Portland office in the Fox Tower The open house will be held on November from pm see attached invitation for details If you have any questions please call Jodi Lietz at RSVPs should also be made to Jodi Take care and I hope to see you at the next meeting in early Pat Visit to get a Web site with a personalized domain and Webbased email Open House Announcementdoc

RE PNW Gas Electric Integration Group Meeting November Steve I know you got involved with the group as a speaker so let me know if you want to continue getting the meeting notices Since Enron is a member you and anyone else in your group is always welcome to attend Ill be sure to pass on any good info I pick up as I still have some options that are now seriously out of the money Take care Pat Harris Steven Steven NRONcom wrote I will not be able to attend Thanks Original Message From Pat Scherzinger ENRON Sent Wednesday October PM To Jim Abbott Frank Afranji Michelle Amicucci Arya
